creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr. and Mrs. George Haldeman
description: ten bold characters in black on white; some dry brush areas; dark blue, gold and yellow mount
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

in black: [ 石影珠閣　滝瀑殸帯玉琹 ] (Stone shadows dapple the jeweled tower; / The waterfall\'s voice girdles the jade qin.) (SA)
markings: near left edge below center, stamped in red: seal; LRC, stamped in red: seal
title: Stone Shadows
